ygData.subject: Re: Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: 0. NAME? no name 1. LIVING ARRANGEMENT? me, my bf, and 3 krappy annoying roomates that live upstairs 2. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING NOW? Merlin s Ring. I just
ygData.messageBody:
0. NAME? no name
1. LIVING ARRANGEMENT? me, my bf, and 3 krappy
annoying roomates that live upstairs
2. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING NOW? Merlin's Ring. I
just finished The Hobbit couldn't put it down gooood
book!!
3. WHAT'S ON YOU'RE MOUSE PAD? it say Seanix and has a
white wavey stripe thing across it, it was free it sux
its too hard of plastic or whatever they make mp out
of.
4. FAVORITE BOARDGAME? Pictionary is fun when yr drunk
but I like monopoly or SW monopoly
5. FAVORITE SMELLS? good food cooking, berry smells,
melon smells my mans cologne when I shove my face in
his neck for a whiff (lmao)
6. LEAST FAVORITE SMELLS? Ammonia, dead animals,
farts, backed up
toilets, (these I steal from Su hehe)
my roomates, stinky feet, when I used to walk into my
moms house and realized the dog did something on the
floor, hurl, old garbage, rotten milk ya know all that
nasty stuff...
7. FAVORITE SOUND? ocean waves and light thunder. ,
rain on the window pane =o) my mans voice when he goes
on about some story
8. WORST FEELING IN THE WORLD? Knowing that I let
someone down or hurt
their
feelings. yep thats sounds good I'll keep that too~ oh
and finding out someone died thats pretty sucky.
9. FIRST THOUGHT IN THE MORNING? I'm hungry I want
something hot (be it tea or coffee or soup, hot is all
I want in the morn)
10. FAVORITE COLOR? I'm digging blue right now but not
dark blue
11.HOW MANY RINGS BEFORE YOU ANSWER THE PHONE? however
long it takes for the caller-id to kick in
12. FUTURE CHILDS NAME? which ones? hehe I want like
3-5!
13. WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT IN LIFE? good times! and
money and travelling
14. FAVORITE FOOD? pretty much everything, I luvvvv
sushi! lasagne pizza, Ichiban ramen... can't think
right now too hungry and its like 6 sumthing in the
mornin'!
15. CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA? Chocolate
16. DO YOU LIKE TO DRIVE FAST? oh hell ya & I never
got a ticket (yet)
17. DO YOU SLEEP WITH A STUFFED TOY? I sleep with my
man
18. STORMS - COOL OR SCARY? Storms are WIckedCool!!
19. WHAT TYPE WAS YOUR FIRST CAR? haven't gotten one
of those yet, drive my parents or my man drives me
20. IF YOU COULD MEET ONE PERSON DEAD OR ALIVE?
hmmmmmmmmm..... I haven't a clue... William Wallace?
21. FAVORITE SONG? right now? I like that your so vein
remix thats always on the radio now it is stuck in my
head now
22. FAVORITE BOOK? Vodka, Tears, And Lenin's Angel by
Jennifer Gould
23. DO YOU EAT THE STEMS OF BROCCOLI? Ya, I luv that
part I hate under cooked broccoli though ugh all hard!
but overcooked is pretty nasty too all mushy ;oP
24. IF YOU COULD HAVE ANY JOB YOU WANTED WHAT WOULD IT
BE? I would work on national geographic or some
travel show where I get to fly all over the world And
be on tv and get paid for it That would RUle!!
25. IF YOU COULD DYE YOUR HAIR ANY COLOR? I wanna see
how it would look kinda blonde or something... haven't
done that one its auburn now
26. EVER BEEN IN LOVE? mmhmm.
27. IS THE GLASS HALF EMPTY OR HALF FULL? depens on my
mood or the time of day or something or how hungry I
am
28. FAVORITE MOVIES? The SHining, Poltergeist, SW
movies (mostly ESB and ROTJ) Willow, Swordfish, X-Men
(hugh jackmans awesome), Braveheart, The Goonies,
E.T., Pretty Woman, The Wedding SInger, Aliens,
Gremlins 1&2, Ghostbusters 1&2, thats all I can think
of right now but i know theres tons more...
29. DO YOU TYPE WITH YOUR FINGERS ON THE RIGHT KEYS?
hell no!!
30. WHATS UNDER YOUR BED? uhh... a flat box from when
we ordered an EQ Strategy book in the mail, and I
think a beerbottle cap, lots of dustbunnies and their
babies, and probly a bit of broken glass I missed when
I went to clean up the glass I knocked off the table
the other day oopsy~
31. WHATS YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER? 5 or 6 I guess?
32. WHATS YOUR FAVORITE SPORT TO WATCH? HOCKEY!!!! go
Canucks and Red WIngs!!! and Maple Leafs!!! and
Habs!!! WOOHOO!!!! Canuckleheads all the way
baby!!!!!YAAA Bring the cup HOME!!!!!!!!! (in my
dreams)
33. SAY ONE NICE THING ABOUT THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS
TO YOU: some of her answers were funnyashell
34. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND? no
idea.
35. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO THAT IS LEAST LIKELY TO
RESPOND? no idea.
36. ARE YOU IN A RELATIONSHIP AT THIS MOMENT? yes
37. IF SO WHAT IS HIS/HER NAME? is a secret too!
39. DOES HE/SHE LOVE YOU? mmhmm
40. HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT OF YOU AND UR BOYFRIEND
/GIRLFRIEND EVER
GETTING
MARRIED? yep
